description: This file contains unit tests for the TicketList React component, including mocking API calls and testing UI rendering scenarios.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Resets all mocks before each test execution.

methods.name: test('renders tickets list')
methods.description: Tests that the TicketList component correctly renders a list of tickets and handles user interaction.

methods.name: test('shows error when API fails')
methods.description: Tests that the TicketList component displays an error message when the API call fails.
